      • supportedGames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends GameState>> supportedGames()
        This method indicates which games the AI supports
        Returns:
        A list of class objects of games supported, or null if all games are supported

      • makeMove

        public Move makeMove(GameState gs,
                     Move m)
        This method is called when your AI needs to make a move. It should fill in 'm' with the appropriate move. Note:This method may be ended prematurely.
        Overrides:
        makeMove in class Player
        Parameters:
        gs - the current state of the game
        m - the object to fill in to represent the AIs move
        Returns:
        the AIs move; This should be m in most cases
